Description
=========================================
WWE All Stars from THQ is an alternative for well-known and popular series WWE SmackDown vs . Raw , which is published by the same company . Although the whole is also based on the WWE license , was treated with a big grain of salt , so the combat system in the game does not have much to do with realism.

Despite this , I still can incarnate here in one of the many world-famous wrestling. Among them appeared John Cena , The Rock and many other well-known stars of the fans of the sport. Care was also properly climatic envelope - our virtual performances comment on Jim Ross and Jerry Lawler , known in the United States with coverage of real fights.

The gameplay in WWE All Stars is impressive and not necessarily having much in common with reality. Taking the long combos and knocking enemies into the air before putting them on the boards here is on the agenda. The game is faster and more dynamic than competitive pushed the series to a more realistic approach to the subject . The most impressive play during the fight , we can admire the different camera angles in slow motion.

In addition, the authors decided to arcade gameplay, visuals also presents a little differently . Design of players deviate from their actual appearance , as you control here are some forms of hypertrophic karykaturalnymi size. This emphasizes even more the fact that it 's just a game at which above all should have fun.

======================================
